title: Great community for great people! Visit today!
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1865/month', 'Location:', '1110 Garden Walk Blvd College Park, GA 30349', 'Unit for Rent:', '3-BR 2-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1348 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '◾ 24hr.', 'Emergency maintenance', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cabana', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Excellent access', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Great guest parking', '◾ Green and flowered areas', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Lounge', '◾ Nature Trails', '◾ On Marta Busline', '◾ On-Site Maintenance', '◾ Organized Activities', '◾ Sports court (outside)', '◾ Two playground areas', '◾ Two pools', '◾ Two tennis courts', '◾ Walking/Biking Trails', '◾', 'Well maintained grounds', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '◾ Air conditioning - central air', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Family Room', '◾ Fireplace - Wood Burning', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Available', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Range w/Oven', '◾ Refrigerator w/Ice Maker', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Sunroom', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Connections in 2 & 3 BR', '◾ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', '◾ Window Coverings', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', "With a variety of floor plans to choose from, we're certain there's one that's just right for you.", 'Browse our one, two, and three bedroom floor plans!', 'Pet Policy:', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is a $300 non-refundable pet fee for each pet.', 'The weight limit is 50 pounds per pet.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Please contact leasing office for complete pet policy details.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Gardenwood Apartments:', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'EF2E8D3BE7334F5']
